p: To investigate the tribological behavior of β-LDS, α-ZrP, MoS 2, MgSH, MgAl-LDH, Graphite, K-LMP and K-LCP in the lubricating grease mentioned above, these additives were added at concentrations of 1.0 to 7.0 wt.%. Each variation of lubricating grease was mixed by mechanical stirring and ground three times in a triple-roller mill.
